###### Renaming Columns

```{r}
#og colnames
colnames(heights)
#Rename Columns
colnames(heights) <- c("timestamp", "sex", "height")
glimpse(heights)
```

```{r}
ncol(heights)
nrow(heights)
```

```{r}
mean(c(1,2,3))
```

```{r}
#Will return 96.6379 - not under same unit (cm or in), 
#too high or too low
mean(heights$height)
```

```{r}
#Hist looks wierd b/c the diff in units
hist(heights$height)
```

```{r}
#Reassign so can type faster
h <- heights$height
```

```{r}
#return a vector of bools
h < 200
```

```{r}
#Removes heights where h < 200 is false
not_big <- h < 200
h[not_big]
```
```{r}
length(h)
length(h[not_big])
```
```{r}
hist(h[not_big])
```
